item.description:
Garrett will be leading a 3 mile walk (aprox.1hour 15 minutes), at Burrage Pond, Halifax,MA.


I was thinking a 3 mile walk. We can start at 9:30 if that works for most people. If you have a GPS the parking is at 140 Elm St Halifax, MA. There's a sign for Burrage Pond at the end of the road. It's just past a bike shop, he has a white bike with Christmas lights out front. Here's a google map link to the parking lot:
item.how_to_find_us: The parking lot, 140 Elm St. Halifax,MA

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Saturday at Burrage Pond
